identity.title: AI Product Manager
identity.summary: AI Product Manager with 4+ years of experience building and scaling SaaS, data-driven, and AI-powered products across different industries. Experienced in experimentation, analytics, and user-centric product development, with hands-on exposure to digital health products.

highlights: Led data-informed product initiatives using A/B testing, Google Analytics, and Hotjar.
Achieved a 3x subscription growth target within 6 months through onboarding and activation improvements.
Collaborated with clinicians, engineers, and marketers on cross-functional product decisions.
Improved mobile and web user flows, resulting in a ~30% increase in appointment bookings.
Delivered performance and profitability analyses for high-traffic SaaS customers.
Improved traffic outcomes by ~30% using data-driven insights.
Supported sales and SEO teams with actionable analytics.
Led the development of the company’s first B2B mobile SaaS product.
Defined MVP scope, user stories, and launch strategy.
Supported early market adoption after MVP launch.
